items.title: Starmer ready for closer alignment with the EU 'in the national interest'
items.description: It is the clearest indication yet the PM wants to pursue a closer relationship with Europe in a broader number of areas.

items.title: Junk food ads banned to tackle childhood obesity
items.description: The government hopes a ban on junk food adverts will prompt manufacturers to develop healthier recipes.

items.title: Who's in charge of Venezuela and what happens next?
items.description: Donald Trump says the US will "run" Venezuela until a "safe" transition after capturing its president and first lady.

items.title: Jeremy Bowen: Trump's action could set precedent for authoritarian powers across globe
items.description: Trump seems to believe he makes the rules and others cannot have the same privileges.

items.title: Man who died trying to save people from sea was selfless hero, family say
items.description: Mark Ratcliffe's family say he was "so cruelly taken trying to save others".
